EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at SpringOne 2GX
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Week of August 24, 2015 <http://www.springone2gx.com?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-25-15> Join us at SpringOne 2GX! Pivotal, in conjunction with the No Fluff Just Stuff Symposium Series, is pleased to present SpringOne 2GX <http://www.springone2gx.com>, the premier Java event of 2015. SpringOne 2GX event has speakers from the Spring, Groovy and Grails ecosystems, with full tracks on Big Data and Cloud Native Applications. The conference will be held September 14 - 17, 2015 at the Marriott Marquis in Washington DC. REGISTER <http://www.springone2gx.com?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-25-15> Podcasts That Cloud Native Lifestyle August 26, 2015 In this episode, Andrew Clay Shafer is back for a discussion with Coté on what Cloud Native means. The pair discuss what they see as the full stack for "Cloud Native," including Cloud Native Application Frameworks, Cloud Native Runtime Platform, Cloud Native Operations and Cloud Native Empowered Culture.
Listen Now <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/that-cloud-native-lifestyle?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-25-15> Come Find Us at VMworld 2015: Aug 30-Sept 3, San Francisco August 20, 2015 VMworld 2015 <http://pivotal.io/event/vmworld?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-25-15> is just around the corner, and Pivotal will be there, talking to customers and partners, chatting about topics like Cloud Native applications and DevOps. There will be eight sessions where Pivotal is presenting, and we are available via many other channels. This post covers all the places you can catch up with us and check out our sessions.
Read More <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/news/come-find-us-at-vmworld-2015-aug-30-sept-3-san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-8-25-15> Pivotal Cloud Foundry The Purity & Tyranny Of A Blank Screen: The Greenfield Journey—Part 2 August 20, 2015 In the second part of this series on the "Cloud Native Journey," Coté focuses on the greenfield journey, defines these projects, explains what their top three goals should be, and offers ten factors that will help teams travel with success. Some of these factors include perspective, project selection and staffing, processes and 12 factor app development, and microservices. Along the way, he also provides a library of links to related resources.
